title: What song has lyrics that go 'fire spreading all around my room it's hard to breath but that's alright, hush'? - Quora

response.answer_text: Don’t be such a lazy fuck. In the time it took for you to ask this question on here, you could have typed “fire spreading all around my room it's hard to breath but that's alright, hush” into Google and got this in return “Sub Urban – Cradles”

https://www.google.com/url?sa=t&rct=j&q=&esrc=s&source=web&cd=&cad=rja&uact=8&ved=2ahUKEwifzMak7rfsAhUIX80KHS-tACcQyCkwAHoECAwQAw&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2Fwatch%3Fv%3Db_weiUqdyTg&usg=AOvVaw3Db-Tk_Ky-LSV3TLlRA8nB If that link doesn’t work, it’s Sub Urban Cradles
